A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought it was a good movie\, but it was very\, very intense. They tried to relieve some of the intensity with jokes. but it was hard to laugh when I was so tense. I assumed we would be saying goodbye to more of the original characters\, and we did\, which is sad\, but it's time to move on to the next generation. The movie was just a placement between the beginning and the end. It was like the middle of a book. Unfortunately\, we will have to wait a while to find out the ending.
